comment._content: I would like to know who posted this... this is my house!

comment.author: 23121382@N07
comment._content: Hello Gwen [http://www.flickr.com/photos/93648322@N08]  This picture is from a Christmas card in the Deseronto Archives, part of a collection of materials relating to the Hall family, who lived in your house for a number of years.
